description: This Dart source file defines design tokens for a Flutter application, including color palette, spacing, and radii constants, intended for consistent styling across the app.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class containing static constants for various app colors, including brand palette, surfaces, and text colors.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: A class that defines spacing scale constants used throughout the UI.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: A class that defines corner radius constants, including a special 'pill' radius value.
